publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7153 Fergus Ewing: The Protected Trust Deeds (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Protected Trust Deeds (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Kenny MacAskill*
